jp_text: 毎度毎度　自分の船を放ったらかして飛び出す艦長がどこの世界にいる
google_translated: Every time I'm in the world where the captain that jumps out of my ship every time

en_text: and rushes out whenever there's danger?
jp_text: いい加減にしろ

en_text: Aren't comrades at sea all family?
jp_text: 海の仲間は家族じゃないのか
google_translated: Are the sea friends not family

en_text: Aren't the crew members\Nof this ship your family?
jp_text: この船の乗組員は家族じゃないのか
google_translated: Is this ship crew not a family

en_text: Well? Answer me!
jp_text: どうなんだ　答えろ

en_text: Isn't this... the home you should protect?
jp_text: ここは　守るべき家じゃないのか
google_translated: Isn't it a house to be protected here?

en_text: Moka... My childhood friend is over there.
jp_text: もかちゃんが　私の幼馴染があそこにいるの
google_translated: Mochi-chan is in my childhood friend there

en_text: She's my dear... best friend.
jp_text: 大事な　親友なの

en_text: Get the Harekaze\Nout of the Musashi's range immediately!
jp_text: 晴風は速やかに武蔵の射程外に出て
google_translated: The fine weather is rapidly out of the area of Musashi

en_text: Hard left rudder!
jp_text: 取舵一杯

en_text: We'll keep our distance between the Musashi,\Nand follow the skipper's movements!
jp_text: 武蔵との距離はこのままを維持し　スキッパーの動きを追う
google_translated: The distance to Musashi maintains this as it is and follows skipper movement

en_text: We have to retrieve our captain, right?
jp_text: 艦長を回収しなきゃいけませんからね
google_translated: I have to recover the captain

en_text: Otherwise, we'd be\Nturning around and running!
jp_text: と…取舵一杯

en_text: What?!
jp_text: 何

en_text: Vice-principal! We've lost contact\Nwith the reinforcement fleet!
jp_text: 教頭　増援艦隊との通信が途絶しました
google_translated: Communication with the teacher's reinforcement fleet was disrupted

en_text: Get it back up!
jp_text: 早く回復しろ

en_text: The Musashi's main battery\Nis turning towards us!
jp_text: 武蔵の主砲　こちらに指向中

en_text: Damn them!
jp_text: おのれ

en_text: Turn away from the Musashi!
jp_text: 武蔵と反向にして

en_text: You're doing great not running away today!
jp_text: よく逃げずに頑張ってるね今日は
google_translated: I'm working hard without running well today

en_text: We have to have the captain... Misaki,\Nbe able to come back!
jp_text: 岬さんが戻って来れるようにしないと
google_translated: I have to be able to come back

en_text: I got something! Three shells\Nfrom the main battery heading this way!
jp_text: 感あり　主砲弾3　こちらに向かってます
google_translated: Sense of main gun 3 I'm heading

en_text: Incoming to the starboard bow in ten seconds!
jp_text: 弾で　弾を撃つ

en_text: They read our movement?
jp_text: 読まれちゃった

en_text: 340 degrees, and 60.
Set 340 degrees, high angle 60 degrees!
jp_text: 340度　仰角60度に備え
google_translated: Preparing at a 340 degree elevation angle of 60 degrees

en_text: Going with a big boom!
jp_text: バキュンと行くよ

en_text: Nice one, Gunner! Your firing\Nof 10 cm shells is so fast!
jp_text: さすが長10センチ砲　発射速度が速い
google_translated: As long as the long 10 cm gun firing speed is fast

en_text: 350 degrees! Fire!
jp_text: 350度　発射

en_text: Our lead shot hit their lead shot.
jp_text: 向こうの見込み射撃にこちらの見込み射撃が当たりましたよ
google_translated: This expected shooting was hit for the prospect of the other side.

en_text: - Yes! Yes! We did it!\N- Aye.
jp_text: やったやった

en_text: Episode 5: Pinched by the Musashi!
jp_text: {\blur3\fscx100\fscy160\fsp6\fad(800,400)}言葉よりも優しく　背中を押すよ
